title: OneDollarCV
description: OneDollarCV is a platform that allows users to create and download professional CVs for just $1. The website is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a focus on user-friendly design and functionality.
keyFeatures: Custom form handling with user input validation.
PDF generation and secure download functionality.
Responsive and user-friendly interface designed by myself.

title: Broadwrite
description: Developed a marketing website using React.js for Broadwrite, a company dedicated to offering affordable assignment assistance to students. The website effectively communicates the companyâ€™s mission to support students in various academic areas.
keyFeatures: Dynamic and responsive front-end built with React.js, ensuring a smooth and engaging user experience.
Clear presentation of services, including coding assistance in languages like Matlab, Python, C++, and Java.
Sections dedicated to additional academic support, including essays, dissertations, exams prep, and more.

title: Multi-step form
description: Developed a multi-step form using React.js, allowing users to input data across multiple steps. This project demonstrates my ability to create dynamic and engaging user interfaces.
keyFeatures: Multi-step form with validation and error handling.
Dynamic form elements that change based on user input.
Clear and user-friendly interface with a focus on user experience.

title: Sunnyside Agency Landing Page
description: Developed a landing page for Sunnyside Agency as part of a Frontend Mentor challenge. This project was aimed at testing and enhancing my page layout and CSS skills.
keyFeatures: Responsive design ensuring optimal viewing experience across devices.
Clean and modern layout with a focus on visual hierarchy and user experience.
Effective use of CSS for layout, typography, and visual elements to create an engaging landing page.

title: Laragigs
description: Developed a job listing platform using Laravel, allowing users to list jobs and their descriptions. This project demonstrates my ability to build full-featured applications with robust backend support.
keyFeatures: User-friendly interface for posting and managing job listings.
Secure user authentication and job management system.
Integration with SQL for efficient data storage and retrieval.
